text:
#COVID19 | PRESIDENT RAMAPHOSA TO ADDRESS THE NATION 

President Cyril Ramaphosa will today, Monday, 30 March 2020, address the nation on the measures currently being undertaken to contain the #coronavirus pandemic. https://t.co/BW2nUvdgqj
